name: 数据库校验-复制下单平仓数据-数据校验
description:
### 测试说明
    - 前置条件：有云策略和云跟单
      1. 进行开仓，手数范围0.1-1，总订单数量2
      2. 平仓-平仓订单数量-1，订单类型-外部订单
      3. 校验数据库是否有未平仓订单-应该没有
      4. 平仓-平仓订单数量-1，订单类型-全部订单
      5. 校验订单数据是否正确
    - 预期结果：平仓的订单类型功能正确
descriptionHtml:
### 测试说明
- 前置条件：有云策略和云跟单
  1. 进行开仓，手数范围0.1-1，总订单数量2
  2. 平仓-平仓订单数量-1，订单类型-外部订单
  3. 校验数据库是否有未平仓订单-应该没有
  4. 平仓-平仓订单数量-1，订单类型-全部订单
  5. 校验订单数据是否正确
- 预期结果：平仓的订单类型功能正确
statusTrace:
self = <lingkuan_refine.test_cloudTrader.test_cloudOrderClose.TestCloudOrderType.TestMasOrderSend7 object at 0x000001EC515881F0>
var_manager = <lingkuan_refine.commons.variable_manager.VariableManager object at 0x000001EC51651FA0>
db_transaction = <pymysql.connections.Connection object at 0x000001EC517BCD30>

    @allure.title("数据库校验-复制下单平仓数据-数据校验")
    def test_copy_verify_close_db2(self, var_manager, db_transaction):
        """验证复制下单平仓后数据库中的订单数据正确性"""
        with allure.step("查询复制平仓订单数据"):
            cloudTrader_user_accounts_4 = var_manager.get_variable("cloudTrader_user_accounts_4")
            cloudTrader_vps_ids_3 = var_manager.get_variable("cloudTrader_vps_ids_3")
    
            sql = """
                       SELECT
                           fod.size,
                           fod.close_no,
                           fod.magical,
                           fod.open_price,
                           fod.symbol,
                           fod.order_no,
                           foi.true_total_lots,
                           foi.order_no,
                           foi.operation_type,
                           foi.create_time,
                           foi.status,
                           foi.min_lot_size,
                           foi.max_lot_size,
                           foi.total_lots,
                           foi.master_order,
                           foi.total_orders
                       FROM
                           follow_order_detail fod
                       INNER JOIN
                           follow_order_instruct foi
                       ON
                           foi.order_no = fod.close_no COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci
                       WHERE foi.operation_type = %s
                           AND fod.account = %s
                           AND fod.trader_id = %s
                   """
            params = ('1', cloudTrader_user_accounts_4, cloudTrader_vps_ids_3)
    
            # 轮询等待数据库记录
            db_data = self.wait_for_database_record_with_timezone(
                db_transaction=db_transaction,
                sql=sql,
                params=params,
                time_field="fod.close_time"
            )
    
        with allure.step("执行复制平仓数据校验-2个订单"):
>           assert len(db_data) == 2, "数据库中没有2个处理的平仓订单，不符合预期"
E           AssertionError: 数据库中没有2个处理的平仓订单，不符合预期
E           assert 3 == 2
E            +  where 3 = len([{'close_no': '7563642234105', 'create_time': '2025-08-20 17:05:24', 'foi.order_no': '7563642234105', 'magical': 67863, ...}, {'close_no': '7563642234105', 'create_time': '2025-08-20 17:05:24', 'foi.order_no': '7563642234105', 'magical': 75004, ...}, {'close_no': '4996215714421', 'create_time': '2025-08-20 17:04:36', 'foi.order_no': '4996215714421', 'magical': 0, ...}])

test_cloudTrader\test_cloudOrderClose.py:1613: AssertionError

    @allure.title("数据库校验-复制下单平仓数据-数据校验")
    def test_copy_verify_close_db2(self, var_manager, db_transaction):
        """验证复制下单平仓后数据库中的订单数据正确性"""
        with allure.step("查询复制平仓订单数据"):
            cloudTrader_user_accounts_4 = var_manager.get_variable("cloudTrader_user_accounts_4")
            cloudTrader_vps_ids_3 = var_manager.get_variable("cloudTrader_vps_ids_3")
    
            sql = """
                       SELECT
                           fod.size,
                           fod.close_no,
                           fod.magical,
                           fod.open_price,
                           fod.symbol,
                           fod.order_no,
                           foi.true_total_lots,
                           foi.order_no,
                           foi.operation_type,
                           foi.create_time,
                           foi.status,
                           foi.min_lot_size,
                           foi.max_lot_size,
                           foi.total_lots,
                           foi.master_order,
                           foi.total_orders
                       FROM
                           follow_order_detail fod
                       INNER JOIN
                           follow_order_instruct foi
                       ON
                           foi.order_no = fod.close_no COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci
                       WHERE foi.operation_type = %s
                           AND fod.account = %s
                           AND fod.trader_id = %s
                   """
            params = ('1', cloudTrader_user_accounts_4, cloudTrader_vps_ids_3)
    
            # 轮询等待数据库记录
            db_data = self.wait_for_database_record_with_timezone(
                db_transaction=db_transaction,
                sql=sql,
                params=params,
                time_field="fod.close_time"
            )
    
        with allure.step("执行复制平仓数据校验-2个订单"):
>           assert len(db_data) == 2, "数据库中没有2个处理的平仓订单，不符合预期"
E           AssertionError: 数据库中没有2个处理的平仓订单，不符合预期

E            +  where 3 = len([{'close_no': '7563642234105', 'create_time': '2025-08-20 17:05:24', 'foi.order_no': '7563642234105', 'magical': 67863, ...}, {'close_no': '7563642234105', 'create_time': '2025-08-20 17:05:24', 'foi.order_no': '7563642234105', 'magical': 75004, ...}, {'close_no': '4996215714421', 'create_time': '2025-08-20 17:04:36', 'foi.order_no': '4996215714421', 'magical': 0, ...}])
